commit message: Update README.md with description of application

initial implementation

This implementation is rather simplistic,
in that a list of audio files is provided
with a drop down. When a file is selected
and 'play' is pressed the file is played
in a loop. The 'stop' button will then stop
the playback.
add initial set of white noise files
add build status info in README.md

Merge pull request #1 from brarcher/initial

Initial implementation

Improve layout of attribution in README.md

do not destroy activity on screen changes

If the screen is rotated or the size changes,
do not destroy the activity and re-create it.
Doing so will stop the currently playing sound.
